text: When you do a preview, the body classes of the template are not added to the body of the preview.
I need something inside the CRM backoffice
Perhaps in the future, HubSpot could allow the creation of modules for the CRM interface

Question on Smart Content & Personalisation - Is there any way to personalise content for visitors that aren't in your CRM?  E.g. If I offer a service to 3 different niches - Food, Tech, Manufacturing - is there any way to serve up personalised content if HubSpot recognises their IP / Company and possibly industry?   So just Food related content to those visitors etc

I know this was mentioned before but searching for it shows its an older result I cant get to. What is the compression the file manager does when an image is uploaded to it? wasn't it something like HS compression the images to 72dpi and 70-80%? Edit: Found it <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1542399249083600?thread_ts=1542397538.080800&cid=C26E7JT8V>

I noticed there are some shortcuts in HubSpot's Rich Text Editor. :+1: For example Command+B bolds any highlighted text or Command+I italicizes any highlighted text. Is there any documentation on all of the available shortcuts?
it used tinymce so these should work in it: <https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/advanced/keyboard-shortcuts/>
cmd + K adds a hyperlink, use that one all the time
you can use a zapier integration if you were using stripe or another supported gateway
does anyone know if it is possible to edit the form error message for HubSpot meetings?
only accepts numbers, but error does not clearly state that
Anyone use <http://Pantheon.io|Pantheon.io> for hosting non-HubSpot websites?
I have one client using pantheon
